EmailTemplate.description: Invoice to be issued by Default (no customer response - last warning)
EmailTemplate.name: AT(3) Inv TO BE issued by Default
EmailTemplate.subject: Invoice to be issued by Default {!Case.Account} {!Case.Case_Number__c} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
To date, we have not received a response to our prior emails regarding your NavDB subscription service renewal.
Please review and confirm your acceptance of the renewal parameters. If a purchase order is required please provide us with this information.
If we do not have a reply by xx xxxxx xxxx the invoice will be issued by default based on the fees shown in the attached file.
We appreciate your business and look forward to hearing from you soon.
Regards,
Account Management Representative
602-436-6739
Fax: 602-822-7333
email: aisaccountservices@honeywell.com
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact the Technical Operations Center at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com {!EmailMessage.TextBody}
